message.body: I am assuming you're bringing your family too. If you do make it, I hope you won't find it awkward that mark is going to be here. Soraya wanted him to come to the 'concert'.
Hi Aziz. Of course I would be happy to see Mark. I may need your address again possibly.
No worries. It is a very informal thingy...and Soraya's saying that half of the 'choir' has backed out!!!!! Have a great rest of the day.
I am so sorry. Wanted to see your mom...
She is coming again soon ish
